reference.title: euca-upload-bundle
reference.shortdesc: Uploads a previously bundled image to the cloud.

row.entry: Name of the bucket to upload to
Path to the manifest file for bundled image
Path to the cloud's X509 public key certificate
The directory containing the bundled image to upload. Defaults to the manifest directory.
Uploads specified part and all subsequent parts

The location of the destination S3 bucket
Valid values: US | EU | us-west-1 | ap-southeast-1 | ap-northeast-1

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus returns status messages that indicate the stages and status of the upload process.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: euca-upload-bundle -b mah-bukkit -m /tmp/myimage.img.manifest.xml Checking bucket: mah-bukkit Creating bucket: mah-bukkit Uploading manifest file Uploading part: myimage.img.part.00 Uploading part: myimage.img.part.01 Uploading part: myimage.img.part.02 Uploading part: myimage.img.part.03 Uploaded image as mah-bukkit/myimage.img.manifest.xml
